Sx4.T1.caption: Table 1: Parameter size and accuracy comparison between different models in our FedOCR. The accuracy is the average result of all testing datasets. The models size refers to the storage occupied on the hard-disk. γ𝛾\gamma is the compression ratio of the hashing technique, and “γ=−𝛾\gamma=-” means that we do not apply the hashing technique to the model. The reduction percentages of parameter size, model size, and accuracy compared with ASTER-FL are shown in parentheses respectively.
Sx4.T1.table:
Models Backbone γ𝛾\gamma Param. (M) Model (MB) Accuracy (%)
ASTER-FL ResNet - 20.99 80.52 91.94
FedOCR-Hash1 ShuffleNetV2 - 13.34 (↓36.45%↓absentpercent36.45\downarrow 36.45\%) 51.37 (↓36.20%↓absentpercent36.20\downarrow 36.20\%) 89.08 (↓3.11%↓absentpercent3.11\downarrow 3.11\%)
FedOCR-Hash1/2 ShuffleNetV2 1/2 6.70 (↓68.08%↓absentpercent68.08\downarrow 68.08\%) 26.05 (↓67.65%↓absentpercent67.65\downarrow 67.65\%) 86.65 (↓5.75%↓absentpercent5.75\downarrow 5.75\%)
FedOCR-Hash1/4 ShuffleNetV2 1/4 3.38 (↓83.90%↓absentpercent83.90\downarrow 83.90\%) 13.38 (↓83.38%↓absentpercent83.38\downarrow 83.38\%) 85.39 (↓7.12%↓absentpercent7.12\downarrow 7.12\%)
FedOCR-Hash1/8 ShuffleNetV2 1/8 1.72 (↓91.81%↓absentpercent91.81\downarrow 91.81\%) 7.05 (↓91.24%↓absentpercent91.24\downarrow 91.24\%) 82.58 (↓10.18%↓absentpercent10.18\downarrow 10.18\%)
references: and six public real-world datasets are used to train local models, and our models are evaluated on seven general datasets. In our federated settings, we construct different local datasets with the public real-world datasets. These datasets are briefly introduced as follows:
contains 9 million images generated from a set of 90k English words. Words are rendered onto natural images with random transformations and effects.
contains 0.8 million images for end-to-end text detection and recognition tasks. Therefore, we crop word images using the ground-truth word bounding boxes.
contains 860 cropped word images for evaluation after discarding images that contain non-alphanumeric characters or have fewer than three characters, which follows
. For training, we use 1150 cropped images after filtering.
, which inherits most images from IC03 and extends it with new images, contains 1015 cropped word images for evaluation after filtering. For training, we use 848 cropped images after filtering.

contains images captured by a pair of Google Glasses casually, and many images are severely distorted or blurred. For a fair comparison, we evaluate models on 1811 cropped word images after filtering. For training, we use 4426 cropped images after filtering.
contains 3000 word images collected for evaluation and 2000 word images for training, which are mostly horizontal text images.
is collected from the Google Street View, and it contains 647 images of cropped words, many of which are severely corrupted by noise, blur, or low resolution.
, which is collected from Google StreetView and contains many distorted images, contains 645 word images for evaluation.
contains 80 real-world curved text images with high quality. For evaluation, we crop 288 word images according to its ground-truth.

is a combination of Total-Text, SCUT-CTW1500, and Baidu Curved Scene Text, which contains images with arbitrary-shaped texts. For training, we use 30271 word images after discarding images that contain non-alphanumeric characters and vertical texts.

is based on the MS COCO dataset, which contains images of complex everyday scenes. For training, we use 31943 cropped images after discarding images that contain non-alphanumeric characters and vertical texts.

Sx4.T2.caption: Table 2: Recognition accuracy in different training manners. “single”: The model is trained only with one participant’s dataset; “centralized”: The model is trained with a centralized set of image data; “federated”: The global model is trained with decentralized sets of image data in a federated manner. The detailed structures of different FedOCR-Hash are shown in Tab. 1.

Models Training IIIT5k SVT IC03 IC13 IC15 SVTP CUTE

single 90.8 83.0 90.9 89.4 77.3 77.5 82.6

federated 92.9 86.9 92.0 91.7 79.4 80.8 86.5

federated 91.2 84.2 91.6 90.7 77.5 76.0 82.6
single 87.2 79.1 87.1 86.1 73.4 71.5 77.4

federated 89.0 81.8 89.3 89.2 76.3 75.2 81.6

federated 86.6 80.1 87.1 85.4 72.4 71.6 79.9
